gradle/org.gradle.api.tasks.compile/GroovyForkOptions

GroovyForkOptions

abstract class GroovyForkOptions : ProviderAwareCompilerDaemonForkOptions(source)

Fork options for Groovy compilation. Only take effect if GroovyCompileOptions.fork is true.
